metadata.title: CVE-2024-22420 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: JupyterLab is an extensible environment for interactive and reproduciblecomputing, based on the Jupyter Notebook and Architecture. Thisvulnerability depends on user interaction by opening a malicious Markdownfile using JupyterLab preview feature. A malicious user can access any datathat the attacked user has access to as well as perform arbitrary requestsacting as the attacked user. JupyterLab version 4.0.11 has been patched.Users are advised to upgrade. Users unable to upgrade should disable thetable of contents extension.

criterions.comment: jupyter-notebook: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
